[HEADING] Master Of Islamic Education
Language Requirement
Language Requirement
Entry Requirement
SYARAT KEMASUKAN/ ENTRY REQUIREMENT
Intake Schedule
Semester I – September/OctoberSemester II – March/April
Course Structure
The program covers Forty-Three (43) credit hours which includes Sixteen (16) credit hours for core courses, Fifteen (15) credit hours for elective courses and 12 credit hours for research
Kursus Teras (Wajib) / Core Courses (Compulsory)
Kaedah Penyelidikan dalam Pendidikan                                                          Research Methods in Education
kredit / credits
Analisis Data Kuantitatif dan KualitatifQuantitative and Qualitative Data Analysis
Seminar Kesarjanaan PendidikanSeminar on Educational Scholarship
Projek PenyelidikanResearch Project
Kursus Teras Disiplin (Wajib) / Core Courses (Compulsory)
Perspektif Penyelidikan dalam Pendidikan IslamResearch Perspectives on Islamic Education
Rekabentuk dan Perkembangan Kurikulum Pendidikan IslamDesign and Development of Islamic Education Curriculum
kredit/ credits
Kursus Elektif (Pilih 5) / Elective Courses (Select 5)
Teori Pendidikan Akhlak Theory of Akhlaq Education
Sosiologi Pendidikan Islam Islamic Educational Sociology
Pendidikan Al-Qur’an dan Tahfiz Al-Quran and Tahfiz Education
Pendidikan Islam Masa Depan Future Islamic Education
Dinamika Pendidikan Islam Klasik dan Kontemporari Dynamic Islamic education Discourses in Classical and Contemporary Views
Aplikasi Maqasid Syariah dalam Amalan Pendidikan Application of Maqasid Syariah in Educational Practice
Praktis Pengajaran dan Pembelajaran Ulum Diniyah Teaching and Learning Practices in Ulum Diniyah
Kepimpinan dan Pengurusan Pendidikan Islam Islamic Educational Leadership And Management
Bahasa Arab untuk Pendidikan Islam Arabic Language for Islamic Education
Perbahasan Epistemologi dari Perspektif Islam dan Barat Epistemology Debate From Islamic And Western Perspectives

PQJ7004 | Sosiologi Pendidikan Islam Islamic Educational Sociology | 3 | kredit / credits
PQJ7005 | Pendidikan Al-Qur’an dan Tahfiz Al-Quran and Tahfiz Education | 3 | kredit / credits
PQJ7006 | Pendidikan Islam Masa Depan Future Islamic Education | 3 | kredit / credits
PQJ7007 | Dinamika Pendidikan Islam Klasik dan Kontemporari Dynamic Islamic education Discourses in Classical and Contemporary Views | 3 | kredit / credits
PQJ7008 | Aplikasi Maqasid Syariah dalam Amalan Pendidikan Application of Maqasid Syariah in Educational Practice | 3 | kredit / credits
PQJ7009 | Praktis Pengajaran dan Pembelajaran Ulum Diniyah Teaching and Learning Practices in Ulum Diniyah | 3 | kredit / credits

[GRID_TABLE]
Benefits
This programme will ensure that educators in Islamic Education are able to apply their knowledge, theory and research to solve related moral and spiritual problems in line with global and national aspirations
